<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file Pass to config the shape of AMX physical registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AMX register need to be configured before use. Before FastRegAllocation pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the ldtilecfg instruction is inserted, however at that time we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// know the shape of each physical tile registers, because the register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// allocation is not done yet. This pass runs after register allocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pass. It collects the shape information of each physical tile register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and store the shape in the stack slot that is allocated for load config</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to tile config register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here is the data format for the tile config.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0      palette</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1      start&#95;row</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2-15   reserved, must be zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 16-17  tile0.colsb Tile 0 bytes per row.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 18-19  tile1.colsb Tile 1 bytes per row.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 20-21  tile2.colsb Tile 2 bytes per row.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ... (sequence continues)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 30-31  tile7.colsb Tile 7 bytes per row.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-47  reserved, must be zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 48     tile0.rows Tile 0 rows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 49     tile1.rows Tile 1 rows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 50     tile2.rows Tile 2 rows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ... (sequence continues)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 55     tile7.rows Tile 7 rows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 56-63  reserved, must be zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RowOffset = 48 + TMMIdx;</span></CodeLine>
